title: The Dominant NFC South, a Check-in With Aaron Rodgers, and Building the Best Offense | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Previewing the Panthers, Saints, and Falcons (3:40), an update on Aaron Rodgers and Matt LaFleur from training camp (14:00), and the top players at each position to build an offense with (23:20).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark
